summary: During the Depression, a con-man promises rain to a desperate drought-ridden Kansas town and marriage to a local desperate spinster.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Katharine Hepburn|Wendell Corey|Lloyd Bridges|Earl Holliman|Cameron Prud'Homme|Wallace Ford|Yvonne Lime|Michael Bachus|Dottie Bee Baker|Kenneth Becker|John Benson|Rudy Bowman|Joe Brown|Tex Driscoll|Herman Hack|Tex Holden|George Huggins|Stan Jones|Jack Kenny|Kermit Maynard|Walter Merrill|Frank Mills|Kansas Moehring|Joe Ploski|Bob Reeves|James Stone|Glen Walters|Dan White
title: El farsante
